name: 2 HEADS 1 BODY
description:
You are an experiment from area 64

You realize that there is a head tied to the end of your body when you hear that the first to pass through 2 doors of your color will be the one that will survive the end of the experiment 

¿Do you think you have what it takes to survive? 

It's a 2 person game Compete with your friends to see who is the best of the 2 and who can save his head
